AltarID1.Name: Apollo
AltarID1.Description: Apollo can help you increase the upper limit of your HP and MP.

AltarID2.Name: Demeter
AltarID2.Description: Demeter can help you restore your HP and absorb damage.

AltarID3.Name: Hermes
AltarID3.Description: Hermes can help you restore your MP and increase the upper limit of your MP.

AltarID4.Name: Hephaestus
AltarID4.Description: Hephaestus can increase your physical attack and target hitting rate.

AltarID5.Name: Hades
AltarID5.Description: Hades can increase your physical attack and spell attack.

AltarID6.Name: Dionysus
AltarID6.Description: Dionysus can increase your physical defense and spell defense.

AltarID7.Name: Aphrodite
AltarID7.Description: Aphrodite can increase your spell defense and help you absorb damage.

AltarID8.Name: Hestia
AltarID8.Description: Hestia can help you absorb damage and increase your dodge rate.

AltarID8.Name: Poseidon
AltarID8.Description: Poseidon can increase your target hitting rate and spell attack.

AltarID8.Name: Artemis
AltarID8.Description: Artemis can increase your dodge rate and help you restore your HP.
